summary: This is an email from July 12, 2019, forwarding a draft response by Jeffrey Epstein's legal team to a bail release request. The email is addressed to the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office, indicating coordination on a legal filing related to Epstein's detention.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the bail release request and the attached legal response draft. The document is a response from his legal team regarding his detention.

events.title: Draft Bail Response Submission
events.description: An email is sent containing a draft legal response from Jeffrey Epstein's team to a bail release request, addressed to a federal prosecutor.

keyFacts: A draft legal response from Jeffrey Epstein's team regarding a bail release request was circulated on July 12, 2019.
The correspondence was directed to the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office, showing federal prosecutorial involvement.
The attached file is named '2019-07-12JE_responsejo_bail_release_request_draft_5_-_CLEAN.docx', indicating it was a cleaned, final draft version.
